Key Match Events: India hunted down a DLS-adjusted 78-run target in just 6.3 overs.
Yashasvi Jaiswal, Suryakumar Yadav, and Hardik Pandya contributed significantly with flashy stroke play.
Sanju Samson was bowled out by Maheesh Theekshana on the first ball.
Suryakumar Yadav hit a hat-trick of swept fours against Maheesh Theekshana.
Sri Lanka's middle-order collapse led to a sub-par total of 161 for nine wickets.
Ravi Bishnoi ended with a three-wicket haul.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was delayed due to a wet outfield and interrupted by rain.
Sri Lanka was well-placed at 130 for two at the 15-over mark before collapsing.
Kusal Perera scored a free-flowing fifty for Sri Lanka.
